PARAGRAPH.STRING: , officially the Republic of Estonia (Estonian: Eesti or Eesti Vabariik), is a country in Northern Europe.
has land borders to the south with fellow Baltic state Latvia (339 km) and Russia (229 km) to the east.
is separated from Finland in the north by the narrow Gulf of Finland and from Sweden in the west by the Baltic Sea.
has been a member of the European Union since May 1, 2004 and of the NATO since March 29, 2004.
